reviewText: I haven't paid attention to the whole story but my kids have already watched 3 times (once a day) and they love it. Another hit!

I like the DVD but I hate the quality of the footage that is provided and this happened to the previous releases this year. The footage is in low-grade interlacing quality and they're being distrubited by Universal, the same company that release well-known films such as 'Back to the Future'. You think that they would provide some good clean footage. When it comes to crystal clear quality, I prefer buying iTunes in 1080p HD. The quality of the footage really stands out. Universal, if you're reading this, please fix the quality of your footage.
Great new holiday stories.
great shows.
Good movie that inspires kids!
My daughter loves Thomas the train. This is a wonderful movie during the holiday season.
I always like Thomas the Train.
My boys love anything Thomas and have watched this one several times without getting tired of it ;-)
My nephew loved it and LOVES Thomas the Train!
Not the best I've seen of the Thomas' series, but it does entertain my son.

I really enjoy Thomas programs for my kids, but this one seems a little spooky and my kids seemed a little lost. Usually they are full engaged in Thomas, but not in this one. It is good, but not the best of the Thomas products.
Another cute Thomas movie.
great
I loved that Diesel was visited by the three ghosts from the Christmas Carol.  Cute spin on this Christmas classic.
Nice holiday movie for the Thomas fans
My kids adore Thomas and all and anything related to Thomas and friends

I was excited to get this new Thomas movie for my train obsessed 3 year old son.  He adores Thomas.  I was disappointing that many of the shorts in this collection had already been shown before and were not new.  Still kept him entertained, but for the money I was hoping for all new content.
My little granddaughter isn't a big fan of Thomas but she did enjoy this and has asked to watch it several times. The Thomas videos are great for young children.
My son watches this movie over and over. He is a bit of a Thomas fanatic, and this movie is among his favorites.
A+ SERVICE. WOULD RECOMMEND.
Great! Love it
Grandsons 2 & 5 years old have played the episodic DVD several times in less than a week.  Thomas fans will be amused.

Our 2 1/2 year old loves Thomas, and since its just about that time of year, we decided to get this for him to watch on a family iPad (so the adults can still watch their shows too!)

He absolutely loves it, and we always make it a habit to watch new Thomas shows/vidoes/movies with him the first few times to relate to the story and follow along with him.

He couldn't be happier!
My small grandson will love this version of Thomas. Thank you.

This is one of the finest Thomas ChristmasDVDs I've ever watched. The episodes were perfectly written and performed. Plus, it showed real class by reenacting one of Charles Dickens' most famous work of classic literature. I indeed recommend this to both kids AND Thomas fans alike.
A Nice collection of Thomas stories, especially The Beast of Sodor
My nephew loved it!
Thomas continues not to disappoint in teaching lessons on treating others as you wish to be treated.
Great deal. Son loved it.

We are great Thomas fans in our house, especially our young son. This is a DVD of several Thomas episodes involving Christmas. It is not the best Thomas collection that we've ever had, but it is very good and we enjoyed watching these Christmas themed episodes on demand during the most recent Christmas season.
Great Thomas movie for an even better price!!
Donated those I was limited in buying from Amazon's rules. :( Sad, I could have bought and donated more for Christmas needy otherwise.
cute
my son loves it. so, there's that.
